Boring as a survivor because of how many chances your given and how little attention the killer is allowed to allot too you do too weak killer perks; no tension.

Frustrating as a Killer because of how quickly gens fly, the lack of agency and regular taunting of the survivors.

O menu é legal. Já a gameplay ora tá bom ora o tá quebrado (geralmente tá quebrado). Ainda com todos os seus defeitos o jogo consegue ser divertido. A menos que o killer ou os survivors joguem de maneira não esportiva o que arruína a experiência dos dois lados.

I've owned the game for awhile just not played it until today. I really like the game so far BUT I've found getting into a match as a survivor really difficult. By the time I grasped how to do things I was having trouble getting into a match. I really enjoy it when i can get into a game!

✓ saltiest community ever
✓ shit-ton of bugs

✓ shit-ton of grind

✓ a lot of underpowered perks that are completely useless
✓ you may or may not have a moderately nice and wholesome time once in a while

Aktualnie chujowa gra, kamperzy co 2 gra eeee trzeba resetować grę bo zapraszanie się buguje i lobby się nie da stworzyć. Minęło tyle czasu od premiery a nie potrafią napisać kodu żeby HP na haku nie spadało gdy killer jest obok haku. Well gra chujowa taka jak giniesz przez chuja który stoi obok ciebie, ale poprawił mi tylko humor Ghostface który dał wygrać i wygłupiał się z nami na grze. Well kiedyś killerzy mieli honor i dume człowieka teraz zostali same spierdoliny i tsza się naszukać na perełki.
